metadata.title: CVE-2017-11403 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The ReadMNGImage function in coders/png.c in GraphicsMagick 1.3.26 has anout-of-order CloseBlob call, resulting in a use-after-free via a craftedfile.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11403` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.3.18-1ubuntu3.1+esm2
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.3.18-1ubuntu3.1+esm2
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.3.18-1ubuntu3.1+esm2
libgraphicsmagick++3 - 1.3.18-1ubuntu3.1+esm2
libgraphicsmagick3 - 1.3.18-1ubuntu3.1+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.18-1ubuntu3.1+esm2').
